data.name: BattlefieldPriest
data.detailed_description:
background story:
In the peaceful kingdom suddenly many nests emerged from the ground,
dark monsters slaughtered the villagers, the old king was terminally ill,
the young prince took on the burden of protecting the kingdom,
the prince was not good at swords, but good at magic and healing,
he began to rely on his own healing spells for protection people

game content
3 races : human ,children of forest , fishman
10+ kind of arms for each races
30+ different monsters;
8 characters ability you can got
build your own army and defence the kingdom

data.short_description: this is a RTS strategy game,if you like Warcraft or Command & Conquer you maybe like this game players controller a priest to healing soldiers and choose which kind of soldiers the kingdom need , killing monters and murch for their nests

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320
  • Graphics: G2Force 7600 GS
